data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Hovedstaden, Denmark. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hovedstaden, Denmark
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the state of Hovedstaden who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 27 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 1,619,536 lost in Hovedstaden that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 60,764 believers in Hovedstaden.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Burmese people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Father, bless the state of Hovedstaden with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 60,764 believers in Hovedstaden, Denmark a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hovedstaden, Denmark has a population of 1,680,300.

We estimate Hovedstaden has 60,764 people who might know Jesus, 1,309,580 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 309,956 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 27 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Hovedstaden.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.
